seasonalambiance.config.title: Seasonal Ambiance Configuration
seasonalambiance.configuration.title: Seasonal Ambiance Configuration
seasonalambiance.configuration.enabled.t: Enable or disable all falling particles
seasonalambiance.configuration.pauseWhen: Pause particle rendering when Minecraft window is not focused (saves performance)
seasonalambiance.configuration.fallSpeed: Multiplier for particle fall speed (0.5 = 50% speed, 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = 200% speed)
seasonalambiance.configuration.horizonta: Multiplier for horizontal sway movement (0.0 = no sway, 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = double sway)
seasonalambiance.configuration.rotationS: Multiplier for particle rotation speed (0.0 = no rotation, 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = double speed)
seasonalambiance.configuration.particleS: Base size of particles in pixels (8-64)
seasonalambiance.configuration.mouseRepu: Radius around mouse cursor where particles are repelled (0 = disabled, 30 = default)
seasonalambiance.configuration.enableInG: Enable particles on all other game screens
seasonalambiance.configuration.forceSeas: Force a specific season instead of auto-detecting
